title: Every Pearl Has Its Oyster
description: The secret’s out and there’s no going back.Not that Gemma really wants to. After the stalker debacle and her big reveal, Gemma Hunter is ready for some big changes. With boyfriend, Tyler Chase, embarking on furthering his superstar status by taking a coveted Hollywood role, Gemma is looking for her own next big step.But nothing ever seems to come easy in the life of Queen Bee. Planning for her big tour becomes complicated when her record label steps in with its own ideas, changing her identity as she knows it. And the media hasn’t particularly been kind to Tyler and Gemma’s relationship, tearing it apart in the tabloids in a way that can’t be ignored. Gemma’s thankful that her old friends have resurfaced to support her but then again, with old friends comes old enemies…
author: India Lee
